name.title: Name
name.description: The name of your air purifier as it will appear in HomeKit

host.title: IP Address
host.description: IP address of your Philips Air Purifier

apiScriptPath.title: API Script Path (Optional)
apiScriptPath.description: Full path to philips_air_api.py (leave blank to use bundled script)

pythonPath.title: Python Path (Optional)
pythonPath.description: Path to Python 3 with aioairctrl installed (leave blank for auto-detection)

pollInterval.title: Poll Interval (ms)
pollInterval.description: How often to poll the device for status updates (in milliseconds, default 10000 = 10 seconds)

items.description: Only needed if you want to use a custom Python script location
Only needed if auto-detection doesn't find the right Python
